amendment.description: To designate the annex to the E. Barrett Prettyman Federal Building and United States Courthouse located at 333 Constitution Avenue Northwest in the District of Columbia as the "William B. Bryant Annex".

vote.text: Amendment SA 1562 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1562 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12591) To designate the annex to the E. Barrett Prettyman Federal Building and United States Courthouse located at 333 Constitution Avenue Northwest in the District of Columbia as the "William B. Bryant Annex".
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1562 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1562 proposed by Senator Warner.
